element.name: TSegment
element.short: Modelizes a straight line linkling two points

element.name: TRoute
element.short: Modelizes a path linking two points (the first and the last). Its a compact modelization of a set of segments.
element.descr: A roote should be kept so that none of its segments intersect.

element.name: TArea
element.short: Modelizes a space region as an union of multiple rectangles.
element.descr: An area should always be contiguous and intersection of any two recatngles should be reduced to the common boundary.

element.name: Bounds
element.short: Creates the smallest rectangle containing all the route points.
